String.string: Meet with Tamur at Kaiator Command Center before heading off to Southern Shara. [Speak with {@linkcreature:84#1088#Yunari} to enter the Kaiator Command Center.]
Meet with Commander Fraya in the Allemantheia Headquarters and request assistance in defeating Kelsaik. (Press to use the teleport scroll you received.)
Speak with {@LinkCreature:74#1100#Elvar} in Elenea and get information on Saleron and the Doomcrypt. (Press to use the teleport scroll you received.)

Speak with Federation Liaison {@LinkCreature:237#1029#Legia} in the Crypt of the Lost to obtain information about Saleron.
(You can use the {@LinkCreature:74#1021#teleportal} to go to the research camp where you can talk to the dungeon flight manager {@LinkCreature:237#2000#Derug} to get to Saleron Research Camp (level 2 basement).)
Speak with {@LinkCreature:237#1027#Torsten} at Saleron Research Camp.
Speak with {@LinkCreature:237#1027#Torsten} at Saleron Research Camp.
There's a giant face on the wall.
Enter the Ebon Span at the Crypt of Decay and speak to {@LinkCreature:237#1102#Saleron}.
